en: * Extraction is a process of creating a copy of already owned Gear. * Extraction requires Extract Tools and a Gear you want to create a copy of. * The available items are displayed in Index - unlock items there to increase the number of Gear available. * Special Event Gear can't be extracted. * Extracting a specific Gear is limited. * Limits reset every 25 days, but you can refresh the limit by using Extract Tools by pressing "Refresh". * Reaching Extraction limit on one Gear does not prevent from extracting other Gear. * Different Gear requires a different amount of Extraction Tools.
it: * L'estrazione è un processo di acquisizione di parti di armamenti di qualità superiore da un equipaggiamento già posseduto. * L'estrazione richiede strumenti d'estrazione e un equipaggiamento da cui vuoi estrarre le parti. * Non tutti gli armamenti possono venire estratti. * Puoi visualizzare l'elenco di tutti i possibili estratti quando selezioni uno specifico tipo di estratto. * L'oggetto di cui estrai le parti non viene distrutto durante il processo. * L'estrazione è limitata solo dalla quantità di strumenti necessari per il processo. * Oggetti diversi richiedono quantità diverse di strumenti d'estrazione. * Una volta acquisito, l'oggetto sarà ricordato nell'estratto. In questo modo, sarà disponibile anche se non l'hai al momento nel tuo inventario.

* Statistics can help you evaluate your own activity and the activity of others, both in the Guild and in the game.

* Some of the statistics can be viewed for “All Time” or just for the current week (“Current”).

* When “All Time” is selected, some of the statistics are split into All Time (Hero’s whole life) and the period for which said hero is in a current guild.

* The week for the “Current” statistics starts and ends on Wednesdays at 14.00 UTC (the time the event ends).

* When “Current” is selected, a change in the all-time statistics (top part of the list, “Hero level” to “Days in Guild”) will be shown.

* “Boss Challenge Score” shows highest Boss Challenge Score achieved so far

* “Guild Experience” shows how much Guild Experience was added by the player (from all possible sources)

* “Collected Trophies” shows how much Trophies player collected in a given time range

* “Sent Caravans” statistic will show proper values once the Caravans feature is added to the game

* “Finished Voyages” shows numbers of voyages the player has finished in a given time range

* Barbershop and Boutique allow players to change their appearance.
* Game appearance is purely aesthetic and has no effect on player's stats.
* Appearance change is free of charge.

* <u>Barbershop</u> contains Cosmetics, which change player's head appearance.
* There are a few Cosmetics that players get at the start of the game. More Cosmetics can be found in different events, rankings, and promo codes. 

* <u>Boutique</u> contains Skins, which change player's gear appearance. This includes Helmets, Armours, Gloves, Boots, and Weapons.
* Boutique's list of available Skins reflects the items unlocked in the Index.
* Only the Legendary Gear provides Skins. 
* There are other unique Skins that can be found in different events, rankings, and promo codes.

* Boss Challenge allows you to test your combat skills in battle against different bosses. You get rewarded with prizes while trying to beat your own high score as well as high scores of other players in Rankings.

* The boss in the Boss Challenge changes every day. Each boss has a unique set of skills and unique resistance to them. 

* Boss’s level will grow in strength every 3 rounds of combat.

* The first battle of the day is rewarded with 1 stamp.

* A boss cannot be killed. Their health is infinite. Their shield, however, is destructible. 

* Each damage point given to a Boss translates into 1 score point.

* Once a player finishes their attempt, they will be placed into a Ranking depending on their score.

* Boss Challenge is limited to 5 attempts per day and this limit cannot be increased. 

* The Rankings will display each players' highest score out of their 5 attempts.  

* Rankings are limited, and you are guaranteed to get some kind of rewards.

* Rewards are given out the next day and they depend on the placement in the Rankings.

en: White talents were created to support your hero during battle. Don't underestimate them - they have great potential and can give you a significant advantage.
it: I talenti bianchi sono stati creati per aiutare il tuo eroe in battaglia. Non sottovalutarli: hanno un grande potenziale e possono offrirti un vantaggio significativo.

en: Blue talents are based on Magic. That allows them to skip opponent's shield and attack directly on HP. This makes blue talents a perfect weapon against tanks.
it: I talenti blu si basano sulla magia. Ciò permette loro di oltrepassare lo scudo dell'avversario e attaccare direttamente i PO. Questo rende i talenti blu un'arma perfetta contro i carri armati.

en: Red Talents are based on Melee Attack. Thanks to their power they allow faster destruction of the opponent's shield. They are a perfect choice for fighting magical enemies.
it: I talenti rossi si basano sull'attacco in mischia. Grazie alla loro potenza consentono una più rapida distruzione dello scudo dell'avversario. Sono una scelta perfetta per sconfiggere nemici magici.

en: Someone said 'Through the thorns to the stars'. So cut the thorns and get the stars.
it: Qualcuno ha detto: "Per aspera ad astra". Quindi supera le difficoltà e raggiungi le stelle.

en:
It does not matter how your gear looks. Ok it's not true.
But the gear stats are also important.
it:
L'aspetto del tuo equipaggiamento non ha importanza. OK, non è vero.
Ma anche le statistiche dell'equipaggiamento sono importanti.

en: There is one thing that makes a hard, bloody, excruciating war much easier - SHOPPING!
it: C'è solo una cosa che può rendere più semplice una guerra dura, sanguinosa e violenta... lo SHOPPING!

en: Let's go to the barrel shop so that you can buy yourself something pretty.
it: Andiamo al Negozio di barili, così potrai comprarti qualcosa di carino.

en: How to recognise a true hero? Simple. A true hero is ALWAYS hungry. Bon appetite!
it: Come riconoscere un vero eroe? Semplice. Un vero eroe ha SEMPRE fame. Buon appetito!

en: Some collect rocks, and some collect bonuses. I recommend the second option, rocks are way too heavy.
it: Alcuni collezionano rocce, altri collezionano bonus. Io consiglio la seconda opzione, le rocce comunque sono troppo pesanti.

en: Nothing can compare to the feeling of a freshly equipped, legendary Orb in your armor. See for yourself!
it: Non c'è niente come la sensazione di una sfera leggendaria appena montata sul tuo equipaggiamento. Prova da te!

en: Orbs are the jewellery of hero world. Don't be shy to show yours off.
it: Le sfere sono i gioielli del mondo degli eroi. Non essere timido e metti in mostra le tue.

en:
"He didn't divide!
He died."
This short poem shows the importance of dividing. I hope it speaks to you.
it:
"Non ha diviso!
Ed è morto."
Questa breve poesia dimostra l'importanza della divisione. Spero ti ispiri.

en: You have to be in shape to protect Valia. Time for your exercise!
it: Devi essere in forma per proteggere Valia. È ora di fare un po' di esercizio!

en: Ah, the thrill of risk... Spinning that wheel makes me feel 10 year younger! Go ahead, give it a try!
it: Ah, il brivido del rischio... Far girare quella ruota mi fa sentire 10 anni più giovane! Dai, prova!

en: "You'll know a smart hero by his merging skills" my nana use to say. Let's see how smart are you...
it: "Riconoscerai un eroe intelligente dalle sue abilità nell'unire" mi diceva sempre mia nonna. Vediamo quanto sei intelligente...

en: Upgrading an Orb is like adding heads to an already very powerful dragon you own. Go ahead, hero, turn your Orbs into beasts.
it: Migliorare una sfera è come aggiungere teste a un drago già potentissimo di tua proprietà. Forza eroe, trasforma le tue sfere in bestie.

en: How many times do you need to upgrade your gear to feel fully satisfied? Let's check.
it: Quante volte devi migliorare il tuo equipaggiamento per sentirti completamente soddisfatto? Vediamo.

en: New places, new possibilities, new dead bodies to loot. Hero's life is a constant adventure.
it: Nuovi luoghi, nuove possibilità, nuovi cadaveri da derubare. La vita di un eroe è un'avventura continua.

en: I always preferred looting gold from dead corpses, but some heroes like claiming it from a bank. Time to check which type are you.
it: Io ho sempre preferito saccheggiare oro dai corpi dei morti, ma alcuni eroi preferiscono ritirarlo dalla banca. È ora di scoprire che tipo sei.

en: What will you smelt and what will you save? The decision is yours.
it: Cosa fonderai e cosa salverai? La decisione è tua.

en: Sea travel has so many advantages: silence, personal growth, promise of adventure. And fresh fish.
it: I viaggi per mare hanno tanti vantaggi: il silenzio, la crescita personale, la promessa di un'avventura. E il pesce fresco.

en: Spend your money wisely or not - you will be rewarded either way.
it: Spendi i tuoi soldi saggiamente, oppure no: verrai ricompensato in ogni caso.

en: Do you like to be surprised? Click on that RELOAD button and enjoy a unpredictable, fresh, new items in our shop!
it: Ti piacciono le sorprese? Fai clic su quel pulsante RICARICA e goditi nuovi e imprevedibili oggetti nel nostro negozio!

en: Orb upgrades are the sit-ups of heroes life. If you don't do them, you don't look so great.
it: I miglioramenti delle sfere sono le flessioni di un eroe. Se non le fai, non hai un bell'aspetto.

en: Enhancing Orbs will allow you to discover their true potential. It will also make you slightly vain and obsessed with endless power.
it: Aumentare le sfere ti permetterà di scoprirne il vero potenziale. Ti renderà anche un po' vanitoso e ossessionato dal potere infinito.

en: There is no limit to your greatness! But just in case, we would like to put a number on it.
it: Non c'è limite alla tua grandezza! Ma giusto in caso, le daremo un numero.

en: Upgrading gear should become your second nature. Think about it, as if it was breathing - if you won't do it, you'll die.
it: Migliorare il tuo equipaggiamento dovrebbe diventare la tua seconda natura. Pensaci, è come respirare: se non lo fai, muori.

en:
If you thought Orbs were just pretty, shiny balls - think again!
Place them in your gear and they will make you invincible!
it:
Se credevi che le sfere fossero solo delle belle palle luccicanti... Non è così!
Posizionale sul tuo equipaggiamento e diventerai invincibile!

en: We all like a little bit if shopping sometimes. Don't deny it. There is nothing sadder than a lying hero!
it: A tutti piace un po' di shopping ogni tanto. Non negarlo. Non c'è niente di più triste di un eroe bugiardo!

en: In this extremely dangerous quest we want you to open a horrifying lockbox! Nah, just joking. It's a regular box, nothing scary about it.
it: In questa missione estremamente pericolosa vogliamo che tu apra un terrificante scrigno! Ahah, sto solo scherzando. È un normalissimo scrigno, non fa per niente paura.

en: Do you like gifts? If you do - it's your lucky day! And if not, what's wrong with you?
it: Ti piacciono i regali? Se la risposta è sì, è il tuo giorno fortunato! Altrimenti... Qual è il tuo problema?

en: Hero's happiness is very much dependent on two things: fighting and the number of treasure chests he opens each day.
it: La felicità di un eroe dipende da due cose: combattere e il numero di forzieri del tesoro che apre ogni giorno.

en: Ah, nothing feels better than opening a fresh, new chest! Except maybe opening an even bigger chests.
it: Ah, non c'è niente di meglio che aprire un bel forziere fresco fresco! Tranne forse aprire un forziere ancora più grande.

en: One thing you will never hear me complaining about - the number of chests us, heroes, have to open everyday.
it: Una cosa di cui non mi sentirai mai lamentarmi: il numero di forzieri che noi eroi dobbiamo aprire ogni giorno.

en: Some quests are more pleasant than others. Like this one.
it: Alcune missioni sono più piacevoli di altre. Come questa.

en: Being a hero is just as much about opening chests with valuables, as it is about saving lives and fighting. Which is GREAT.
it: Essere un eroe comporta aprire forzieri con preziosi tanto quanto salvare vite e combattere. Il che è FANTASTICO.

en: Looting should become an everyday habit. Just like cleaning your teeth.
it: Lo sciacallaggio dovrebbe diventare un'abitudine quotidiana. Come lavarsi i denti.

en: A true hero always wants more. More power, more glory, more gear. I guess you can say, we are all a bunch of hoarders.
it: Un vero eroe vuole sempre di più. Più potere, più gloria, più armamenti. Potremmo dire che siamo tutti una massa di accattoni.

en: Sometimes you have to sacrifice something to gain something... It's the same with enhancing the Orbs.
it: A volte bisogna sacrificare qualcosa per ottenere qualcosa... È lo stesso concetto dell'aumento delle sfere.

en: No talking, just fighting. I miss the sound of clashing weapons, it calms me down.
it: Non si parla, si combatte. Mi manca il suono delle armi che si scontrano, mi calmava.

en: Travelling broadens the mind...aaand it's a great way to get some cash and eternium!
it: Viaggiare apre la mente... e poi è un ottimo modo per fare un po' di soldini ed eternium!

en: It's the dirt of the battle that makes you a real hero. SO START SLAYING THEM BEASTS NOW!
it: È lo sporco della battaglia che ti rende un vero eroe. QUINDI INIZIA SUBITO AD AMMAZZARE QUELLE BESTIE!

en: Complete all voyages to become a known traveller. You can expect songs being written about you later - who wouldn't want that?
it: Completa tutti i viaggi e diventa un noto viaggiatore. Vedrai che scriveranno canzoni su di te, chi non lo vorrebbe?

en: Combining a piece of equipment is a very subtle work. Considering the size of your hero hands, I'll be surprised if you succeed...
it: Combinare un pezzo di equipaggiamento è un lavoro molto delicato. Considerando la taglia delle tue mani da eroe, sarei sorpreso se ce la facessi...
Sacco di sfere leggendarie e usabili

en: Gems and gold, Rewards and ranking
it: Gems e oro, tappe e classifica

en: Schemes and gems, Rewards and ranking
it: Schemi e gemme, tappe e classifica

en: CRAFT LIKE NO ONE IS WATCHING
it: CREA COME SE NON CI FOSSE UN DOMANI

en: HALF THE EFFORT, TWICE THE JOY
it: IL DOPPIO DELLA GIOIA PER METÀ SFORZO
LA FESTA PREFERITA DI UN EROE

en: GEMS ARE A HERO'S BEST FRIEND
it: LE GEMS SONO LE MIGLIORI AMICHE DI UN EROE

en: THE MORE GOLD, THE HAPPIER THE HERO
it: PIÙ ORO C'È, PIÙ L'EROE È FELICE
IL MATTINO HA L'ORO IN BOCCA
SALE, SALE E NON FA MALE
IL MIGLIORE AMICO DI UN EROE
NON C'È INFERNO COME CASA PROPRIA

en: Become a legend! Take part in this new amazing event!
it: Entrate nella leggenda! Prendete parte a questo nuovo, fantastico evento!

en: Oy Daredevils! New crafting week has started! Score yourself some GREAT prizes!
it: Ehi voi, temerari! Una nuova settimana di creazione è iniziata! Aggiudicatevi dei MAGNIFICI premi!

en: New, amazing items in Stamp Shop and Barrel Shop! Check them out!
it: Nuovi, fantastici oggetti nel Negozio di francobolli e nel Negozio di barili! Vai a controllare!

en: - Spend and Top-up Rewards and Rankings!
it: - Spendi e ricarica tappe e classifica!

en: Drop everything and join this event now. And here's why:
it: Lascia perdere tutto il resto e partecipa ora a questo evento. Ed ecco perché:

en: Is it worth it? Sure it is! Take a look yourself:
it: Ne vale la pena? Ma certo che sì! Dai un'occhiata da te:

en: Embrace the opportunity, because we're offering you:
it: Cogli questa opportunità, perché ti offriamo:

en: What are you waiting for? There are plenty of reasons for you to join us!
it: Che cosa aspetti? Ci sono un sacco di motivi per unirti a noi!

en: What are you waiting for? Here is what we have prepared for you.
it: Che cosa aspetti? Ecco cosa abbiamo preparato per te!

en: Still not convinced? How about these reasons:
it: La cosa ancora non ti convince? Che ne dici di queste motivazioni:

en: And here are some reasons why you should join the event right now:
it: Ed ecco alcuni motivi per cui dovresti partecipare ora all'evento:

en: Don't hesitate, because there are plenty of reasons for you to join us!
it: Non esitare, ci sono tantissimi motivi per unirti a noi!

en: We hope you will join us in this one-of-a-kind event and have loads of fun!
it: Speriamo che ti unirai a noi in questo evento unico per divertirti un sacco!

en: Still hesitating? Here are some reasons for you to change your mind:
it: Esiti ancora? Ecco alcune ragioni che ti faranno cambiare idea:

en: Here are the reasons to join:
Put your hero skills to the ultimate test!
it: Metti le tue abilità di eroe alla prova suprema!

en: Will you be the shark of the ranking?
Dominate the rankings and get what you deserve!
it: Domina le classifiche e ricevi ciò che ti spetta!

en: Stop doubting yourself and put your skills to the test!
it: Smetti di dubitare di te e metti alla prova le tue abilità!

en: Face your inner fears and grab destiny by it's Orbs!
it: Affronta le tue paure più profonde e afferra il destino per le sfere!

en: Will you follow your instincts and rise to the top?
it: Seguirai il tuo istinto per salire fino in cima?

en: Will you get what your heart desires?
it: Otterrai ciò che il tuo cuore desidera?

en: Will luck be on your side?
it: La fortuna sarà dalla tua parte?

en: What will you win, how determined are you going to be?
It's time to wrestle with destiny again! Join our new event!
it: È ora combattere nuovamente contro il destino! Partecipa al nuovo evento!

en: The quest for eternal glory awaits!
it: La missione per la gloria eterna ti attende!

en: Time to face your fate again!
it: È ora di affrontare nuovamente il tuo destino!

en: Are you in a need of a fancy yet powerful item?
it: Ti serve un oggetto tanto stiloso quanto potente?
Di' di sì alla buona fortuna!
Segui i tuoi desideri più materiali!
La tua nuova avventura inizia qui!

en: Prepare yourself for an outrageous adventure!

* Newcomers ranking shows TOP 50 players with highest Hero Power

* The higher the Hero Power, the higher the position

* Ranking only shows new players, who have created their hero no longer than 14 days

* Players older than 14 days disappear from this ranking

* Ranking removes older players once every few hours

* Battle Event Loadouts allow you to modify your Weapons and Talents for each individual fight type in the Battle Event

* Weapons can modify your hero power in a given fight type

* Talent presets are loaded directly from your Hero>Talents tab

* Changing a Talent in a given preset get automatically updated in Loadouts where they were selected

* Certain fight types can have a given Talent forced, meaning it cannot be changed

<align=center>
<align=center><size=200%>The Conflict - comic strip
<align=center>Part 2

<img6>

<align=center><color=#4a3a23>_______________

<img0>
<align=center><size=200%>Have you heard the legend of the Twin Jade Dragons? 
<align=center>Part 1

<size=300%>   S</size>iblings, trained together and tasked with the same responsibility: to guard the powerful dragon eggs from those who would want to use them for their own means. They traded their duty from day to night, only meeting at dawn and dusk, fully devoted to their task. 

As the years passed, they kept their post in the secret vault. In their loyalty they were as similar as siblings can be. But in their understanding of what their duty entailed, they turned out to be as different as the night and day.

<img1>

<align=center><color=#4a3a23>_______________


<align=center><size=200%><color=#089972>The Jade Guardian</size>

<size=200%>   T</size>his is what he knows: like his father before him, like his grandmother before him, like the generations of his family for centuries past, he will watch over and protect his charges.

There aren’t many dragons left in the world. Some remain, holed deep in the caves in the mountains, or in the fiery volcanic wastelands, lashing out at anyone foolish enough to venture into their territory. 

<img2>

Dragons are amongst the most powerful creatures the world has known. In the old age, as they worked with rulers they trusted, they could be the cities’ most valued protectors. But dragons are temperamental, tempestuous, as unpredictable and dangerous as the elements they draw their powers from. It would be foolish to destroy the eggs, it would be a folly to let them hatch.

And so the Jade Guardian will watch over them - and protect the world from them. 

<align=center><color=#4a3a23>_______________


<align=center><size=200%><color=#4c574b>The Shadow Jade</size>

<size=200%>   T</size>his is what she knows: for generations, her family watched over the dragon eggs, for no reason other than that it has always been done. 

The dragons are dangerous, more so than any other creature. There are some still left, vicious and old, attacking indiscriminately out of fear and hatred. But dragons are loyal, even to a fault. The old rulers kept their loyalty by raising them from the young, by nurturing a bond with them. It served both the dragons and the cities they kept safe, but it kept them captive all the same. 

<img3>

The dragon eggs must be protected from those who would use them for power, who would bond the dragons to themselves and lash against the world. But the threat is far greater when they are eggs, when young dragons could be so easily influenced.

And so the Shadow Jade will protect them - and set them free far away from the rest of the world.


 <align=center><color=#4a3a23>_______________

<img4>
 
<img5>
it:
<align=center>
<align=center><size=200%>The Conflict - comic strip
<align=center>Part 2

<img6>

<align=center><color=#4a3a23>_______________

<img0>
<align=center><size=200%>Conosci la leggenda dei Draghi di Giada Gemelli?
<align=center>Part 1

<size=300%>   F</size>ratello e sorella, addestrati insieme e incaricati della stessa responsabilità: custodire le potenti uova di drago da coloro che avrebbero voluto usarle a proprio vantaggio. Si scambiavano i turni dal giorno alla notte, incontrandosi solo all'alba e al tramonto, completamente dediti al loro compito.

Col passare degli anni, continuarono a svolgere il loro lavoro nell'antro segreto. In fatto di lealtà, erano simili quanto possono esserlo i fratelli. Ma nella comprensione di ciò che comportava il loro incarico, si rivelarono diversi come il giorno e la notte.

<img1>

<align=center><color=#4a3a23>_______________


<align=center><size=200%><color=#089972>Il Guardiano di Giada</size>

<size=200%>   E</size>cco ciò che lui sa: come suo padre prima di lui, come sua nonna prima di lui, come le generazioni della sua famiglia nei secoli passati, veglierà e proteggerà ciò che gli è stato affidato.

Non sono rimasti molti draghi nel mondo. Alcuni ancora esistono, rintanati nelle profondità delle caverne sotto le montagne, o nelle ardenti lande vulcaniche, pronti a scagliarsi contro chiunque sia abbastanza sciocco da avventurarsi nel loro territorio.

<img2>

I draghi sono fra le più potenti creature che il mondo abbia mai conosciuto. Nelle ere antiche, poiché collaboravano coi regnanti di cui si fidavano, potevano essere i più stimati protettori delle città. Ma i draghi sono capricciosi, impetuosi, imprevedibili e pericolosi quanto gli elementi da cui traggono i loro poteri. Sarebbe sciocco distruggere le uova, sarebbe folle lasciarle schiudere.

E così il Guardiano di Giada veglierà su di loro - e proteggerà il mondo da essi.

<align=center><color=#4a3a23>_______________


<align=center><size=200%><color=#4c574b>La Giada d'Ombra</size>

<size=200%>   E</size>cco ciò che lei sa: per generazioni, la sua famiglia ha vegliato sulle uova di drago, per il semplice fatto che è così che è sempre stato.

I draghi sono pericolosi, più di qualsiasi altra creatura. Ne sono rimasti alcuni, feroci e anziani, pronti ad attaccare indiscriminatamente spinti da paura e odio. Però i draghi sono anche fedeli, persino troppo. I vecchi regnanti ne ottenevano la fedeltà allevandoli da piccoli, coltivando un legame con loro. Serviva sia ai draghi che alle città che proteggevano, ma li manteneva prigionieri.

<img3>

Le uova di drago devono essere protette da coloro che le userebbero per ottenere potere, stabilendo un legame coi draghi per se stessi e scagliarsi contro il mondo. Ma la minaccia è ancor più grave quando sono uova, poiché i giovani draghi possono essere influenzati molto facilmente.

E così la Giada d'Ombra li proteggerà - e li libererà lontano dal resto del mondo.

en:
<align=center><size=140%>Secret Codes!
<align=center><i>Spread the love, spread the codes and get free rewards!

There are 4 tabs in the Secret Code window, and in this article you'll learn how each of them works! 

<align=center><color=#4a3a23>__________________________

<img1>
<align=center><size=143%>SECRET CODE tab
<indent=5%>• This tab is used to view & copy your Secret Code, which you can send to a friend
<indent=5%>• After your friend enters your code into his game, you will get your first reward!
<indent=5%>• You can send your code to multiple people, leave it on our Social Media channels, like Discord or Facebook (links below)
<img0>

<align=center><color=#4a3a23>__________________________


<img2>
<align=center><size=143%>YOUR CODE PRIZE LIST
<indent=5%>• This tab is used to view your rewards you can receive if your friends enter your code X times.
<indent=5%>• You can only claim rewards when a milestone is reached

<align=center><color=#4a3a23>__________________________


<img3>
<align=center><size=143%>FRIEND'S SECRET CODES
<indent=5%>• This tab is used to enter your friends' codes! If you shared yours, be a good player and copy theirs so they receive rewards as well!
<indent=5%>• You can enter a unique Secret Code only once. If you want more codes from other players, visit our Social Media channels!
<indent=5%>• You can also enter here special <u>PROMOTION CODES</u>, which can be found on our Social Media, Ads, and other in-game Events!
<indent=5%>• Try it yourself! Use this code to see how it works: <color=#961c06>QUESTLOVE</color>

* The Multismelt allows you to smelt multiple items from your Gear tab all at once! 

* If you want to smelt items from your Parts, you have to merge them first.

* At this moment, <u>a maximum of 150 items</u> can be smelted at once.

* You can use the quality filters below to specify which items will be selected for smelt.

* The items to be smelted are selected in order of their quality.

* This means that if you selected the UNCOMMON and RARE filter, the limit will be first applied to the UNCOMMON, and its remainings will go for RARE.

* For example, let's say you have:
- 50 x COMMON items
- 50 x UNCOMMON items
- 100 x RARE items
* You've selected the COMMON, UNCOMMON, and RARE qualities in your filters.
* If you press the "MAX" button, the Multismelt will use 50 x COMMON, 50 x UNCOMMON, and 50 x RARE items. 

Play around to figure everything else!

* The Idle Rewards provide you with free rewards every minute of your game, regardless you have the game opened or closed.

* You can collect those rewards at any time, no matter how long it's been since your last claim.

* The rewards accumulate for up to 12 hours. After this time, no new rewards are added and you must claim the rewards for new ones to start generating.

* The number of rewards that are generated per minute is depended on your progress in the Campaign. 

* In addition to Eternium, Gold, and Experience Points, you can also get other items and currencies, which are random - a sweet surpise!

* Event Trophies Milestones is a list of milestones containing rewards a player can claim.
* To unlock a milestone, a given number of Event Trophies has to be collected by the player.
* Event Trophies can be claimed from fighting at stages in the Campaign Event and with Easy & Hard bosses in Event Boss, both of which are located in the Battle Event.

* Super Rewards are only available once the player purchases the Super Rewards Pass and has the required number of trophies for that given milestone.
* Super Rewards Pass only lasts for one Battle Event.

* Event Trophies Milestones are open for the player to claim up to 24 hours after the Battle Event ends.

* Guild Rewards is a list of milestones containing rewards a player can claim.
* To unlock the possibility to access milestones, a player needs to collect Guild Trophies.
* Guild Trophies can be claimed from fighting with the Guild Boss in the Battle Event.
* Guild Rewards are fully locked for players who have switched guild during the Battle Event.

* Challenges include Tower Challenge and Boss Challenge

* In Tower Challenge you progress through Tower to reach the highest floor possible

* The Tower Challenge does not reset

* In Boss Challenge you fight with various bosses that change every day.

* Boss Challenge includes ranking and rewards for players that deals the most damage to the boss.

* In Tower Challenge you can progress through hundreds of floors proving your power and earning valuable rewards.

* Fighting in the Tower Challenge is not limited and does not consume any energy.

* Each stage can be completed only once.

* After completing the stage you will be able to fight the next one.

* The Tower Challenge does not reset.

* Awaken is used to change Gear's quality to Artifact

* Only Legendary Gear can be turned into Artifact

* Once Legendary Gear is awakened, it changes its quality into an Artifact I - its first stage

* Artifacts provide increased potential, overall statistics, and reforge points

* Artifact I can be further awakened to other stages of Artifacts

* Every stage increases Gear's potential and statistics by 20%

* To Awake Gear, you need to sacrifice Gear

* Every recipe requires you to provide:
- A copy of the original Gear
- Emblem-specific Gear corresponding to the original Gear
- Any Legendary Gear

* The third slot "Any Legendary Gear" also allows you to use Legendary Craft Tokens in addition to or instead of Gear

* Legendary Craft Tokens can only be obtained from dividing other Artifacts in the Divide

* Gear used as materials for Awakening is irretrievably lost

* Awakened Gear <u>cannot</u> be downgraded to lower stages of an Artifact.

* The Shrine is where you can make duplicates of Talents you already own. 

* You create duplicate Talents using Seeds.

* There are three different colors of seeds: red, blue, and white. 

* Seed colors correspond to their respective Talents: 
- Red - Melee Talents
- Blue - Magic Talents
- White - Support Talents

* You can obtain seeds from Crafting, Challenge Bosses, PvP, and Quests.

* Talents are a Hero’s abilities that are used in battle.
* There are three types of Talents: Melee, Mage, and Support.
* Each Talent has 3 unique skills. 
* Skills are activated by using 1, 2, or 4 spirits.
* Each spirit color corresponds to its respective Talent - red for Melee, blue for Magic, and white for Support. 
* Talents can be upgraded using duplicates of the same Talent card, Gold, and Eternium.

* In the Tavern you can use the Lucky Spin Wheel or claim your free Loot Ticket. * Loot Tickets can be claimed every 8 hours. * You can get Gems by watching ads. * You can watch a maximum of 2 ads per day for Gems.

* Quest Events are short events that require completing tasks.
* Each task gives points for which the player can receive subsequent Rewards .
* Tasks can be limited and/or unlimited.
* After the Quest Event ends, the player has 24 hours to collect prizes. The Quest Event is then deleted.
* They are a great way to spend time in-between bigger events.
* There can be multiple Quest Events available at one time so players can pick the one that suits them the most.
* Participating in the Quest Events can additionally help the player in the Grand Event too.

* Quest Events are short events that require completing tasks.
* Each task gives points for which the player can receive subsequent Rewards.
* Quests can be limited and/or unlimited.
* After the Quest Event ends, the player has 24 hours to collect prizes. The Quest Event is then deleted.

* Allows sending notifications to all Guild Members.
* The period between sending and receiving notifications can take from seconds to a few minutes.
* Notifications can be disabled in the game settings.
Notifications guidelines:
* Please make sure that notifications are brief and precise. Try to make them as short as possible.
* Please do not use abusive comments, hate speech, racism, harassing, trolling, incessant, threatening, sexual or otherwise uncomfortable messages in your notifications.
* Posting negative content or creating content that paints other members in a negative or hurtful light will not be tolerated.

* Shows the 100 players who achieved the highest score in the Boss Challenge.
* This ranking does not reset.
* Hall of Fame can sometimes refresh with a slight delay.

* Position in this ranking is based on characters' Hero Power.
* Shows your position as well as 10 closest players above, and 10 closest players below you in the ranking.
* Hall of Fame can sometimes refresh with a slight delay.

* Shows the top 20 players with the highest Hero Power on the server.
* Hall of Fame can sometimes refresh with a slight delay.

* The Guild Ranking only shows the 20 best Guilds on the server.
* Position in the Guild Ranking depends on the position taken by the Guild in the last 12 Battle Events (you can check the scoring below).
* Ranking points will be given only to the 30 best Guilds in every Battle Event (15 Gold and 15 Silver).
* In case of a draw (same amount of points in this ranking), the higher position goes to the Guild which was higher last week.
* Scoring started from the 25th of September, 2020.

Scoring (Position in the Battle Event = Guild Ranking Points):
<indent=7%>1 - 1000 pts</indent>
<indent=7%>2 - 800 pts</indent>
<indent=7%>3 - 600 pts</indent>

* Rewards allow you to collect guaranteed rewards for participating in the Battle Event.
* Each Reward requires Trophies. Some may also require other items related to the Battle Event.
* Items required by Rewards are not lost/taken in the process of claiming rewards.
* Rewards don't have to be claimed in any specific order.
* Each Reward can only be claimed once per event.

* Links allow you to increase specific statistics of your hero for all Battle Event Battles.

* The effect of links add up with the effect of Multipliers.

* Every tier (row) of items in the Multipliers has its own links.

* You can have 1 active link per tier.

* To activate the link, you need to put the required type of item in the matching tier of the Multiplier.

* The order of the items does not matter.

* You can put items in slots without leaving the pop-up link. Use the slots visible at the top of the pop-up to do so.

* Choosing one link in a row disables the other ones. It’s up to you to find the optimal configuration.

* Items without Multiplier can be used to activate the link, but it’s not the optimal solution.

* The subscription will automatically renew every month charging you with its cost.

* You can cancel the subscription in your device's store.

* When you cancel the subscription it will not renew for another month but you will still have all perks until the already purchased one ends.

* The Gems and items from the subscription will be sent to your mailbox daily upon logging in, for the duration of the subscription.

* First purchase bonus will be given immediately after the payment is confirmed.

* The first purchase bonus will be given for the first purchase only. If you decide to cancel the subscription and then purchase it again, you will not get the bonus.

* Aside from Gems and items, subscription provides you with numerous benefits that will improve your gaming experience and allow you to save time.

* The perks are active only for the duration of the subscription. You will lose access to them when your subscription ends.

* Event Trade Spot uses Medals as currency.

* Medals can be earned in the Battle Event.

* Medals reset every week when the Grand Event ends, so it’s a good idea to spend them all before this happens.

* Items sold in this shop are used to compete in the Battle Event.

* Grand packs will grant more loot. They also have an additional chance of getting a Gift.

* Shown rewards will be sent to the Guild Masters. Rewards are granted by ranking a given place after the event ends.

* The rewards will be sent to Guild Master’s mailbox.

* The first pack contains gifts that are meant to be sent by the Guild Master to their Guild members and the second pack contains gifts for the Guild Master him/herself.

* Rewards may change between different Battle Events.

* The Guilds are divided into 3 leagues: Gold, Silver, and Bronze.

* After every event, the top guilds from the Bronze league will replace the last Guilds from the Silver league, and top Silver leagues will take the place of the last Golden league Guilds.

* The Bronze League is infinite. All guilds that are participating in the event and were not promoted to higher leagues are in this league.

* Since Trophies are reset every week, all guilds in the league will have equal chances at the start of a new Battle Event.

* The rewards a Guild receives depends on their ranking in their respective League.

* The rewards can be seen on the Leaderboard Rewards tab.

* The progress bar shown in the Rewards tab shows how many Trophies your Guild needs to get to the next tier rewards.

* The tier rewards are much higher in higher leagues.

* The rewards will be sent to the Guild Master after the Battle Event ends.

* The list shows the promoted Emblem and the featured items.

* All gear pieces belonging to the promoted emblem will provide multipliers.

* All items shown on the list will also provide a multiplier.

* Items that are not on the list and do not belong to the promoted Emblem will not provide the multiplier during the current Battle Event.

* You will find information on where to get certain items next to the list.

* Some items may become available some time (few days) after the event starts. In this case, a timer will be provided.

*  Increasing your Multiplier will greatly improve your combat capabilities in the Battle Event

* During Battle Event battles all your statistics are multiplied by the value of your Multiplier

* Fill Multiplier slots (second tab of the Battle Event) with featured items and gear pieces belonging to promoted Emblem to increase your Multiplier

* When you attack the bosses, your statistics are multiplied by the value of your multiplier - you will be much more powerful than in other fights. 

* When attacking the boss you can use Strike or Super Strike which costs 3 times as many tickets, but you fight with all your statistics multiplied by 5. 

* There are 3 bosses - one [EASY], one [HARD], one [MULTI] - all requiring separate tickets to start a fight.

* [MULTI] boss changes player's statistics to a given number, which means that ALL players have the same statistics during the fight with this boss

* Only the Multiplier and your Weapons/Talents choice can make the biggest difference

* [EASY] boss and [MULTI] Boss are capped at 50 levels (you can repeat the last level). The [HARD] boss has much higher statistics compared to the [EASY] boss but goes over level 100 and offers much higher rewards.

* The Boss’ power increases rapidly. You will need to increase your Multiplier to progress with Bosses on higher levels.

* Remember that even though you failed to defeat a Boss, you still have some time to fight it again and finish the job.

* Using SUPER STRIKE will be the only way to defeat a Boss with a higher level.

* Rewards for Boss fights increase slowly while fighting Bosses on lower levels, but will gradually get better as you progress through the levels.

* The "AUTO" feature:

<img0>

• The "AUTO" button replaces the button that was used to defeat the Boss (either the Super Strike or Strike)
• The "AUTO" button only shows if you've won the fight on your first try. So, if you were defeated on your first try, and won on your second go, the "AUTO" button will not show under that button.

Scenario 1 (right):
• You've used Strike and have won on your first go
• The "Strike" button gets replaced by the new "AUTO" button
• ...and as a safeguard, to avoid unintentional miss-clicks, the "Super Strike" gets disabled

Scenario 2 (left):
• You've used Super Strike and have won on your first go
• The "Super Strike" button gets replaced by the new "AUTO" button
• The "Strike" button remains unchanged

Scenario 3 (left):
• Scenario 2 takes place
• If you are strong enough, you can try defeating the boss by using the "Strike" button
• If you are successful on your first go, the "Strike" button gets replaced by the new "AUTO" button
• ...and as a safeguard, to avoid unintentional miss-clicks, the left "AUTO" gets disabled

* The Multiplier multiplies all hero’s statistics by the given amount when you fight in the Battle Event. * Your total Multiplier works for both Boss Event and Campaign Event. * Every event features a specific Emblem that provides multiplier for all Gear of that Emblem. * The Multiplier of Gear of featured Emblem depends on its quality. * There are additional Gear and other items containing extra Multiplier. You can see all of them by tapping the “Featured Items” banner on the top of the screen. * Promoted Gear can be boosted to increase the item's multiplier. Other items cannot be boosted. * Event's Emblem Gear gives: Artifact Gear - x6 Multiplier Legendary Gear - x6 Multiplier Epic Gear - x4 Multiplier Rare Gear - x3 Multiplier * Other Event items give: Promoted Gear - x20 Multiplier Legendary Emblem Token - x20 Multiplier Epic Emblem Token - x10 Multiplier Rare Emblem Token - x7 Multiplier Legendary Emblem Orb - x20 Multiplier Epic Emblem Orb - x10 Multiplier Rare Emblem Orb - x7 Multiplier Legendary Friend Token - x15 Multiplier Epic Friend Token - x10 Multiplier Rare Friend Token - x7 Multiplier * Square slots are used for Gear and items like Tokens, and Circular slots are used for Orbs. * Gear can be put in the Multiplier slots even if it's currently equipped on the Hero or in the Collections. * Gear’s multiplier will not benefit from upgrades, reforging, bonus links, etc. * Every row of slots can grant you a special bonus in the Battle Event when completing certain links. Click on "LINKS" to learn more. * No slot can repeat Gear or Tokens that are already used elsewhere in the Multiplier. Only Orbs can repeat.
Fame Perks will be used in guild modes, and will be available in the upcoming updates.

* The list displays perks the Guild gets once it reaches a required level.

* The item rewards will be sent to the Guild Master. Banner Elements will be immediately added to the list of Banner Elements the moment the Master collects the rewards from their mailbox. 

* Guild Experience is increased when a Guild member makes a Donation to the Guild House.

* The Gifts are unique items that can only be sent to other Guild members.

* Each Gift contains content which will be received by the chosen Guild member.

* There are no limits on the number of gifts that can be sent.

* Received gifts can be claimed in the Mailbox.

* In this ranking, players are divided into tiers based on their Trophies.

* Each Tier has specific requirements. It’s either being in the top 100 players with the highest number of Trophies, or getting a score that falls within the required range (of highest scores per server) for the given tier.

* Each tier has different rewards. You can see them by tapping the chest icon.

* Trophies can be earned by battling in the Event Campaign and Event Bosses.

* The top 100 players can be seen in a separate tab.

* Additional Ranking (and rewards) are usually available in Quest Events.

* The amount of Trophies required for each tier is changing live, but the ranking refreshes every few minutes. It’s possible that the shown required amount of Trophies is a little outdated, and in reality, is different.

* All acquired Trophies are deleted at the end of each event.

* All players start new Battle Events with zero Trophies and equal chances.

* Index shows all Gear and Orbs that exist in the game.

* Once you acquire the item, it will be marked (shown without opacity) and you will receive the points for it.

* Points you receive for the item are shown below the item.

* Once you acquire the item, it will remain marked even if you get rid of it.

* Some items that can be seen in the Index may not be available to obtain. If you want to collect all items you should pay close attention to events and crafting challenges.

* In the Campaign Event, your task is to progress through a special Campaign to collect rewards, especially Trophies and Boss Tickets. * Battling in Campaign Event costs Campaign Tickets. At the start of the event, all players will receive some tickets. More will be available throughout the game. * Tickets renew over time, and can by additionally obtained from Quest Events and other areas. * The cost of tickets per battle increases depending on the player’s progress in the Campaign Event. * Using Auto instantly grants you rewards for completing one battle on a given stage. * Using Auto requires achieving 3 stars on the stage and costs Tickets and Auto Tickets. * Auto Tickets can be obtained from the Battle Event gameplay. * The Campaign Event is divided into 2 difficulties. To fight in the second difficulty, you must complete the first one. * Every next stage in the Campaign Event is more difficult but rewards you with more Trophies. * Rewards for stars are separate for each difficulty. They also get better as the difficulty increases.

* Battle Event is a special kind of event that requires fighting. * Battling in the Battle Event requires Tickets that renew over time and can be acquired in different Game Modes (especially Quest Events). * Note that you have to enter Battle Event at least once before it starts (Friday, 12:00 UTC) to trigger Ticket regeneration after Battle Event starts (after 12:00 UTC). * All won battles in the Battle Event are rewarded with Trophies. There is a special Ranking where all players participating in the event are ranked according to the number of trophies they gathered. * Trophies, Tickets and other event items are deleted once the Battle Event has ended. Check out the Items tab of your hero to see the "time-limited items" section.

It’s your personal space in the Guild. Here you will be able to see the history of all your contributions to the Guild.

By contributing to the guild you will earn Fame which will unlock perks. You will keep the Fame and active Perks even if you decide to change guilds.

* Amount of the items that you can buy daily in the Guild Shop depends on your Fame level (it is always your fame level x2 so if your Fame level is 3 you can buy 6 items daily).
* Limits in the Guild Shop are identical for all Guild members.
* the Guild Limit doesn't reset after being used.
* Daily Guild Limit resets every day at 03:00 UTC.
* Purchases made by each Guild member can be found in the Shop Log.

* The list shows all member of the guild divided by their rank. * The ranks are: Guild Master - Can edit guild name, banner, requirements and other information - Can accept join requests - Can promote, demote or kick all other guild members Officer - Can edit guild name, banner, requirements and other information - Can accept join requests - Can promote or kick Knights Knight * All members of the guild can use Guild Chat. * The amount of Officers is limited to 5 * If the Guild Master leaves the guild the Officer with highest hero power will become the Guild Master. If there are no Officers the Knight with the highest power will be chosen. * Higher Guild level will increase the maximum number of members. Guild level will be earned by various guild activities. * If the last member of the guild leaves it, the guild will be disbanded.

Pass through the portal and face great challenges that will put you and your mates to the test. On the other side of the portal, you will find Guild Wars with intoxicating fame and glory, Guild Raid with excellent loot and much more…

* Guild House is a place where all members work together to improve their guild and themselves. * Members can make a donation that will be awarded Guild Experience, Fame, and Guild Coins. * Guild experience is required to level up the guild * The Fame is individual to each member and it is a measure of how much you participated in guild’s life. Your current Fame won't be deleted in case you decide to change guilds * Guild Coin will be required for purchases in the Guild Shop * There are 3 kinds of donations, 2 of which can be done by everyone and 1 reserved only for players with higher VIP level * Each donation can be done once every 24h. You can make all 3 kinds of donations at once * Gold or Gems spent on Donations is not refundable, even if you leave the guild, get kicked from it or the guild is disbanded * In Academy you can complete research that will increase statistics of all members of the guild. * Completing research requires fulfilling its requirements (filling the progress bars) by making Tributes. * There are 4 kinds of Tributes: - Gold - Eternium - Blue Writs - Red Writs * Tributes are not refundable * Each tribute can be made every 8 hours * You can make tributes to every available Research * Higher level research require certain Guild Level and completing other Research first * The increase in statistics provided by Academy is calculated from the final hero’s statistics

* You need to be at least level 20 or VIP 3 to create a guild. 

* Creating a guild costs 100 000 gold. This gold will not be refunded if you disband or leave the guild. 

* You will be able to change all selected things later after the guild is created. 

* The guild name must be between 2 and 15 characters and can't be offensive or vulgar.

* In a "Private Guild" Guild Master or Officers will have to accept join request before the player is added to the guild. A "Public Guild" is a guild that can be joined instantly (if you meet the criteria).

* Flag helps to identify the nationality (and language) of the guild. 

* Setting requirements will make the guild available only for players who meet them. Only those players will be able to join or send you a join request.

* Supply Caravan with requested goods to earn materials necessary to develop the guild and make purchases in the Guild Shop.

* You will have to work together to meet requirements of some more advanced Caravans. But that will pay off with much greater rewards!

* You can change the banner without any costs or limits

* The banner is purely aesthetic, it does not change the guild power or abilities 

* New elements of the Banner will be available as rewards in the Guild Events

*Guild Master and Officers will be able to pin the messages as Announcements. 

*Those messages will be easily visible to every member of the guild and should make coordinating the guild much easier.

* The list shows all guilds on your server

* By default guilds are sorted by Power, descending.

* Guild Power is a sum of Hero Power of all guild’s members

* A Guild can be either public (free to join by everyone who meets the criteria) or private (Guild Master or Officers must accept a join request)

* A Guild may have requirements such as minimal hero level, minimal hero power or minimal VIP level. If you do not meet them you will not be able to join or apply to this specific guild.

* The number of maximum members in a Guild is limited. If the guild is full nobody can join it.

* You can use a search feature to find a given guild or filters to narrow the list to guilds meeting your criteria. 

* Creating a guild requires at least level 20 or VIP 3 and costs Gold.

ARENA * Arena allows you to challenge other players and put your battle skills to the test. * Arena is divided into Divisions. * Over time, new Divisions may be created. * The higher the Divisions, the higher the overall position and the better the rewards. * Being in the a Divisions grants everyday rewards, such as: Honor and Gems. The rewards can be claimed via mailbox. * In each battle on the Arena, the first action always belongs to the defender. * Arena maintenance occurs at (UTC): - ASIA: 14:00 - 14:30, - VETERANS/EUROPE: 22:00 - 22:30, - AMERICA/GLOBAL 4:00 - 4:30 At this time you won't be able to fight for a short period of time and rewards will be sent. * When you are defending yourself on the arena you are using the talents, main hand and off hand set in defense setup tab * When you are attacking on the arena you are using the talents, main hand and off hand set in offense setup tab * The amount of points, which you will obtain or lose are based on ELO rating system, which means that the greater the risk, the more you can gain and the smaller the risk, the more you can lose DIVISIONS RULES * Each battle in arena grants additional points that define the ranking. Victory adds points while defeat deducts points. * Each arena battle cost an Arena Ticket, which you can buy with Gems at Honor Shop, with Gold at the Marketplace or acquire from Daily Routine and Spin. * Free arena battles are available daily. Number of those battles depends on your VIP level. On VIP 1 you have 2 free fights available every day.

* Reforge your gear to increase its statistics. * Every Upgrade gives your item new Reforge Points. * Reforge Points can be later converted into its statistics. * If an item has Reforge Stats but no Reforge Points, Reforging will cause points to transfer from one statistic to another. * Performing Reforge requires Reforge Powder + Gems or Gold. * Reforge performed with Gems results in a faster allocation of all Reforge Points. * Using Reforge x20 allows you to get the effects of 1 Reforge multiplied 20 times - with one click of your finger! Reforge x20 costs 20 times as much as one, regular Reforge. * After performing a Reforge, you still need to confirm its results. Confirming will permanently save changes in statistics. * Even if you decide to discard changes in statistics, you will still be charged for performing the Reforge. Most Reforge Powder used in the process can be later recovered by using the Divide area in the Forge. * You can perform Reforge on Equipped Gear of any level over 1.
it: * Riforgia il tuo equipaggiamento per aumentarne i dati statistici. * Ogni miglioramento e potenziamento fornisce al tuo oggetto nuovi punti riforgiatura. * I punti riforgiatura possono essere convertiti in seguito in statistiche per quell'oggetto. * Riforgiare un oggetto che ha già molti dati statistici di riforgiatura può risultare nell'aumento di una statistica e nel trasferimento di alcuni punti da un dato statistico all'altro. * Se un oggetto dispone di statistiche di riforgiatura ma non di punti riforgiatura, riforgiandolo i punti si trasferiranno da un dato statistico all'altro. * Per riforgiare serve polvere di riforgiatura + gemme od oro. * La riforgiatura eseguita con gemme risulta in una più rapida assegnazione di punti riforgiatura. * Usando riforgiatura x10 si ottiene l'effetto di 1 riforgiatura moltiplicato 10 volte, in un solo clic! Riforgiatura x10 costa 10 volte quanto la normale riforgiatura. * Dopo aver eseguito una riforgiatura, devi confermarne l'esito. Confermando, salverai le modifiche in modo permanente nelle statistiche. * Anche se decidi di rifiutare le modifiche nelle statistiche, dovrai comunque pagare il costo di riforgiatura. La maggior parte della polvere di riforgiatura usata nel processo può venire recuperata in seguito con Dividi * Puoi eseguire la riforgiatura su armamenti equipaggiati di qualsiasi livello, o su armamenti da Collezione di livello 1.

en:
* Honor Shop allows you to exchange Honors for prizes.

* Honors are gained by participating in PvP Divisions.

* The higher the Divisions, the more Honors you get.

* Honors are assigned every day at 03:00 UTC and sent to your mailbox along with other rewards.

* Daily Limit = limited number of items you can purchase daily. This amount is reset every day at 03:00 UTC.

* Amount limit = limited number of items you can purchase in general.

* New Delivery stands for shop assortment restock and a reset of shopping limit.
it:
* Il Negozio dell'onore permette di scambiare Onore con premi.

* L'Onore si ottiene partecipando alle leghe PvP.

* Più alte la lega e la propria posizione al suo interno, maggiore sarà l'Onore ottenuto.

* L'Onore è assegnato ogni giorno alle 03:00 UTC, e inviato alla propria casella di posta assieme alle altre ricompense.

* Limite giornaliero = numero di oggetti acquistabili ogni giorno. Questa quantità si azzera ogni giorno alle 03:00 UTC

* Limite quantità = numero di oggetti che puoi acquistare in generale.

* L'acquisto di alcuni oggetti richiede uno specifico livello personaggio.

* Nuova consegna significa che il negozio è stato rifornito e che il limite degli acquisti è stato azzerato.

en:
* Stamp shop allows you to exchange Stamps for prizes.

* A Stamp is the reward in the Daily Task Points rank.

* Daily Limit = limited number of items you can purchase daily. This amount is reset every day at 03:00 UTC.

* Amount limit = limited number of items you can purchase in general.

* Purchasing some items requires reaching a certain character level.

* New Delivery stands for shop assortment restock and a reset of shopping limit.
it:
* Il Negozio dei francobolli permette di scambiare Francobolli con premi.

* Un Francobollo è la ricompensa della classifica dei punti per i compiti giornalieri.

* Limite giornaliero = numero di oggetti acquistabili ogni giorno. Questa quantità si azzera ogni giorno alle 03:00 UTC

* Limite quantità = numero di oggetti che puoi acquistare in generale.

* L'acquisto di alcuni oggetti richiede uno specifico livello personaggio.

* Nuova consegna significa che il negozio è stato rifornito e che il limite degli acquisti è stato azzerato.

en:
* Barrel Shop allows you to exchange Barrels for amazing prizes.

* Barrels can be collected after every finished voyage and after completing all Voyages from the list.

* Daily Limit = limited number of items you can purchase daily. This amount is reset every day at 03:00 UTC.

* Amount limit = limited number of items you can purchase in general.

* Purchasing some items requires reaching a certain character level.

* New Delivery stands for shop assortment restock and a reset of shopping limit.
it:
* Il Negozio di barili permette di scambiare barili con fantastici premi

* I barili possono essere ritirati dopo ogni viaggio completato, e dopo aver completato tutti i viaggi dell'elenco.

* Limite giornaliero = numero limitato di oggetti acquistabili ogni giorno. Questa quantità si azzera ogni giorno alle 03:00 UTC

* Limite quantità = numero di oggetti che puoi acquistare in generale.

* L'acquisto di alcuni oggetti richiede uno specifico livello personaggio.

* Nuova consegna significa che il negozio è stato rifornito e che il limite degli acquisti è stato azzerato.

en: * In the Tavern you can use Spin or claim your free Loot Ticket. * Loot Ticket can be claimed every 8 hours. * You can get Gems by watching ads. * You can watch max. 2 ads per day.
it: * Nella Taverna è possibile utilizzare il Giro o ritirare la propria Bevanda energetica due volte al giorno. * Le Bevande energetiche sono ritirabili alle 16:00 e alle 22:00 orario locale. * Ritirando la Bevanda energetica si aggiungono automaticamente 10 punti energia al proprio livello di energia attuale. * Si possono ottenere gemme guardando spot pubblicitari. * È possibile guardare un massimo di 10 spot al giorno.

en:
* Monthly Contract is valid for 30 days, counting from the day of purchase.

* Monthly Contract Guaranteed Daily Prize is sent to all Monthly Contract owners every day. This kind of prize can only be claimed if the player is logged into the game on the exact date the prize was sent.
it:
* Il Contratto mensile è valido per 30 giorni a partire dalla data d'acquisto

* Il Premio garantito giornaliero del Contratto mensile viene inviato a tutti i possessori di tale contratto ogni giorno. Questo tipo di premio può venire riscattato solo se il giocatore ha effettuato l'accesso al gioco il giorno stesso in cui il premio è stato inviato. 

* Ogni acquisto di Contratto mensile viene ricompensato con punti VIP.

en:
* Please note that the six awards you see on the display are just some of the many awards you can win in this event.

* There are many more items to win - some as powerful as those displayed, and some of lesser quality.
it:
- Nota: le sei ricompense visualizzate sul display sono solo alcune delle tante che si possono vincere durante questo evento

- Ci sono molti altri oggetti da vincere, alcuni molto più potenti di quelli mostrati, altri di qualità inferiore

en:
* Tavern Spin is modified during this event.

* New Tavern Spin rewards can be added or regular rewards may be enhanced.
it:
* Il Giro della Taverna viene modificato durante questo evento.

* Nuove ricompense Giro della Taverna possono venire aggiunte o le ricompense abituali possono venire aumentate.

en:
* This event rewards you for logging into the game every day.

* The awards are reset every 30 days.

* The Award reset causes unclaimed rewards to be lost.

* If you skip a day, you can claim your reward the next time you log into the game.
it:
* Questo evento ricompensa per avere effettuato l'accesso al gioco ogni giorno.

* Le ricompense vengono azzerate ogni 30 giorni.

* L'azzeramento delle ricompense comporta la perdita di tutte le ricompense non riscattate.

* Se si salta un giorno, la ricompensa può venire riscattata al successivo accesso al gioco.

en:
* Starter Pack contains items and materials to allow instant development of your character.

* Starter Pack can only be bought once.
it:
* Il Pacchetto Principiante contiene oggetti e materiali che permettono uno sviluppo istantaneo del proprio personaggio.

* Il Pacchetto Principiante può essere acquistato una sola volta.

en:
* This event awards you prizes for logging into the game every day for a week.

* Prizes won in the event must be claimed.

* Skipping a day results in the event resetting and losing claimed event awards.

* This is a one-time event, available for new players only.
it:
* Questo evento assegna premi per avere effettuato l'accesso al gioco ogni giorno per una settimana.

* I premi vinti durante l'evento vanno riscattati.

* Saltando un giorno l'evento viene azzerato e si perdono le ricompense evento riscattate.

* Questo è un evento unico, disponibile solo per i nuovi giocatori.

en:
* This event awards you prizes for daily gem purchase.

* Includes gems purchased in the shop only.

* Doesn't include promotions or VIP bonuses.

* Acquired gems don't have to be spent. 

* Prizes won in the event must be claimed.

* Rewards and reward limits are identical every day.
it:
* Questo evento assegna premi per l'acquisto quotidiano di gemme.

* Include solo gemme acquistate al negozio.

* Non include promozioni o bonus VIP.

* Le gemme acquisite non devono per forza essere spese. 

* I premi vinti durante l'evento vanno riscattati.

* Le ricompense e i limiti delle ricompense sono identici ogni giorno.

en:
* This type of event awards you prizes depending on your gem purchase.

* Doesn't include promotions or VIP bonuses.

* Acquired gems don't have to be spent. 

* Prizes won in the event must be claimed.
it:
* Questo tipo di evento assegna premi a seconda dell'acquisto di gemme.

* Non include promozioni o bonus VIP.

* Le gemme acquisite non devono per forza venire spese. 

* I premi vinti durante l'evento vanno riscattati.

en: * This type of event awards you prizes depending on the number of gems you've spent daily. * Rewards specification can be seen under the Rewards button. * All gems you spend in the game count. * Rewards and reward limits are identical every day. * A particular prize can be claimed only once a day. * Prizes won in the event must be claimed.
it: * Questo tipo di evento assegna premi a seconda del numero di gemme che sono state spese quotidianamente. * Le specifiche delle ricompense sono visualizzabili sotto il pulsante Ricompense. * Tutte le gemme spese in gioco contano. * Le ricompense e i limiti delle ricompense sono identici ogni giorno. * Uno specifico premio può essere riscattato solo una volta al giorno. * I premi vinti durante l'evento vanno riscattati.

en: * This type of event awards you prizes depending on the number of gems you've spent in the game. * Rewards specification can be seen under the Rewards button. * All Gems you spend in the game count. * Prizes won in the event must be claimed.
it: * Questo tipo di evento assegna premi a seconda del numero di gemme che sono state spese in gioco. * Le specifiche delle ricompense sono visualizzabili sotto il pulsante Ricompense. * Tutte le gemme spese in gioco contano. * I premi vinti durante l'evento vanno riscattati.

en:
* A special chest with unique prizes is available during this event.

* The Event Chest can contain either item parts or whole items. 

* Chest purchase is unlimited. 

* Top Item List contains the very best of all available items - not all of them.
it:
* Uno speciale forziere contenente premi unici è disponibile durante questo evento.

* Il Forziere evento può contenere sia parti di oggetto che oggetti interi. 

* L'acquisto di forzieri è illimitato. 

* La Lista oggetti principali contiene il meglio di tutti gli oggetti disponibili, non tutti gli oggetti.

en:
* Shows players who are most active during the event.

* Each event has its own ranking.

* At the end of every event, first rank heroes are awarded prizes.

* Prizes are awarded according to the ranking status when the event closes.

* Prizes are sent to the mailbox together with information regarding the player's final position in the ranking.

* Ranking is updated in real time with minor delays possible.

* Event ranking position is calculated using the following criteria:
- The number of spins in Spin Events
- The number of gems spent in Buy Gem Events 
- The number of gems purchased in Top-Up Events
it:
* Mostra i giocatori più attivi durante l'evento.

* Ogni evento ha una sua classifica dei piazzamenti.

* Al termine di ogni evento, gli eroi delle prime posizioni ricevono dei premi.

* I premi sono assegnati a seconda della posizione al termine dell'evento.

* I premi sono inviati nella casella di posta con informazioni relative alla posizione finale in classifica del giocatore.

* La classifica viene aggiornata in tempo reale con il minor ritardo possibile.

* La classifica degli eventi è calcolata secondo i seguenti criteri:
- Il numero di giri durante gli Eventi giro
- Il numero di gemme spese durante gli Eventi Acquisto gemme
- Il numero di gemme acquistate durante gli Eventi Ricarica

en:
* Prizes need to be claimed and each one can only be claimed once. 

* All opened Eternal Chests are taken into account - including free ones opened with [b]Chest Keys.[/b]
it:
* I premi vanno riscattati e ciascuno può venire riscattato una sola volta. 

* Vengono conteggiati tutti i forzieri antichi aperti, inclusi quelli gratuiti aperti con le [b]chiavi del forziere.[/b]

en: * A unique type of Spin is available during this event. * Subsequent spins can be purchased with gems. * The number of spins is unlimited. * A required number of spins is rewarded with Extra Gifts. * Extra gifts need to be claimed and each one can only be claimed once.
it: * Durante questo evento è disponibile un particolare tipo di giro. * I giri gratis sono disponibili ogni giorno durante l'Evento Giro. * I giri seguenti possono venire acquistati con gemme. * Il numero di giri è illimitato. * Il numero di giri richiesto è ricompensato con Regali extra. * I Regali extra vanno riscattati e ciascuno può venire riscattato una sola volta.

en:
* Unique Craft Recipes are available only during the event

* Event Craft can require different items than regular materials

* All items used as materials are non-recoverable

* Each event craft can be performed a limited number of times. The exact number varies depending on the specific item and event.
it:
* Durante questo evento sono disponibili Ricette di creazione uniche

* La creazione durante un evento può richiedere oggetti diversi dai materiali soliti

* Tutti gli oggetti e i materiali usati non sono recuperabili

* Ogni creazione effettuata durante un evento è eseguibile per un numero limitato di volte Il numero esatto varia a seconda dello specifico oggetto e dell'evento.

en:
* This event temporarily modifies the City shop inventory and prices.

* Unique items or materials may appear in the shop inventory, and shop prices may be lowered.
it:
* Questo evento modifica temporaneamente l'inventario e i prezzi del negozio della città.

* Oggetti o materiali unici possono apparire nell'inventario del negozio e i prezzi del negozio potrebbero abbassarsi.

en:
* Ranking allows you to compare your progress with that of other players.

* Ranking is updated in real time with minor delays possible.

* There are no rewards for being placed in the rankings.

* Players are rewarded for PvP League.
it:
* La classifica ti permette di confrontare i tuoi progressi con quelli degli altri giocatori.

* La classifica viene aggiornata in tempo reale con il minor ritardo possibile.

* Non ci sono ricompense per il piazzamento in classifica

* I giocatori sono ricompensati per la lega PvP

en:
* You can pick up your ranking rewards and monthly contract in your mailbox.

* Administrative instructions and problem related refunds are also found here.

* You cannot send mail via this mailbox.

* Message is permanently lost once deleted.

* Messages are deleted automatically after 30 days.
it:
* Puoi ritirare le tue ricompense per la posizione raggiunta e il Contratto mensile nella tua casella di posta.

* Qui troverai anche istruzioni amministrative e rimborsi in caso di problemi.

* Non puoi inviare e-mail tramite questa casella di posta.

* I messaggi vanno persi in modo permanente una volta cancellati.

* I messaggi vengono eliminati automaticamente dopo 30 giorni.

en:
* VIP status is a title awarded for gem purchases. 

* There are a few VIP status levels and each one of them grants unique privileges.

* Each VIP prize can be received only once.

* VIP status level is measured by base value of purchased gems. Bonuses and promotions are not included.

* Each subsequent level of VIP offers the same privileges as the previous one plus new ones.

* VIP statuses are added permanently - you cannot lose them.
it:
* Lo status VIP è un titolo assegnato in seguito all'acquisto di gemme. 

* Vi sono alcuni livelli di status VIP e ognuno di essi garantisce privilegi unici.

* Ogni premio VIP può essere ricevuto una sola volta.

* I livelli di status VIP si misurano in base al valore delle gemme acquistate - bonus e promozioni non inclusi.

* Ogni livello di status VIP consecutivo offre gli stessi privilegi del precedente, più dei nuovi vantaggi.

* Gli status VIP sono conferiti in modo permanente e non possono venire persi.

en:
* Earn Gems are specific game goals. Reaching them is rewarded with Gems.

* After reaching one goal and claiming the reward, a new goal appears.

* The goals differ in objective, difficulty and reward.
it:
* Gli Ottieni Gemme sono specifici obiettivi di gioco. Raggiungendoli, ricevi gemme come ricompensa.

* Dopo aver raggiunto un obiettivo e averne riscattata la ricompensa, un nuovo obiettivo appare, con un compito più complesso e una ricompensa migliore.

* Gli obiettivi variano in quanto a compiti da svolgere, difficoltà e ricompensa.

en: * Quests are assignments given to hero by NPCs. * They lead the character through the game and allow valuable prizes to be won. * New quests are available after finishing the required quest, unlocking locations or reaching certain levels in the game. * Each quest can only be done once. * Given quest prizes must be claimed; they are not added automatically.
it: * Le missioni vengono assegnate all'eroe dai PNG. * Questi guidano il personaggio durante il gioco e gli permettono di vincere importanti premi. * Delle nuove missioni diventano disponibili dopo aver completato quella in corso, sbloccando scenari o raggiungendo alcuni livelli di gioco. * Ogni missione può essere giocata una sola volta. * I premi delle missioni vanno riscattati: non vengono aggiunti automaticamente.

en: * Completing daily tasks is rewarded with points. * The number of points for each task can be seen in the task description. * Reaching certain numbers of task points is rewarded with prizes. * Tasks are reloaded daily, at 03:00 UTC.
it: * Il completamento di compiti giornalieri è ricompensato con punti. * Il numero di punti di ogni compito è visibile nella descrizione del compito. * Il raggiungimento di un certo numero di punti viene ricompensato con dei premi. * I compiti si ricaricano ogni giorno, alle 03:00 UTC.

en: * Stage list is a list of all stages in one location on one difficulty. * Passing all stages in a location unlocks the next new location. * Stages marked red are Boss Stages. * Boss Stages are harder, but there is a chance of getting a stage prize, visible on the stage icon. * Each stage can be finished with one, two or three stars. * To achieve a bigger amount of stars, a player needs to finish combat in shorter time (smaller number of turns). * After getting the required number of stars in a location, players can claim their prize. * There are two levels of difficulty. The higher difficulty is unlocked at level 18. * At each level of difficulty, map progress starts from zero and the rewards for combat and stars are different. * The number of battles you can fight at one stage is limited. * The Stage Battle Limit can be reset with gems. * This limit is separate for each stage of the game. * Skip battle feature is always available in the battles you have already won. * Using Auto loot requires 3 stars on a given stage.
it: * L'Elenco fasi è una lista di tutte le fasi di uno scenario per una difficoltà * Superando tutte le fasi di uno scenario, si sblocca lo scenario successivo. * Le fasi indicate in rosso sono fasi con il Boss. * Le fasi con il Boss sono più difficili ma ti danno la possibilità di vincere un premio, visibile sull'icona della fase. * Ogni fase può essere completata con una, due o tre stelle * Per ottenere un maggior numero di stelle, il giocatore deve concludere il combattimento in minor tempo (meno turni) * Se ottiene il numero richiesto di stelle in uno scenario, il giocatore può riscuotere il suo premio * Ci sono tre livelli di difficoltà: , , . La difficoltà si sblocca al livello 16 e al 32. * Per ogni livello di difficoltà, i progressi sulla mappa partono da zero e le ricompense per combattimenti e stelle sono diversi * Il numero di battaglie che si può affrontare per ogni fase è limitato. * Tale limite può venire azzerato usando delle gemme. * L'azzeramento del limite di combattimenti dipende dal tuo livello VIP. * Questo limite è individuale per ogni fase del gioco. * La funzionalità Salta combattimento è sempre disponibile per i combattimenti che hai già vinto. * Salta combattimento è disponibile per combattimenti che non hai ancora vinto, o dal livello VIP 3. * Salta istantaneamente per i combattimenti che non hai ancora vinto è disponibile dal livello VIP 3. * Saltando un combattimento puoi ottenere una sconfitta. Il combattimento si gioca in modo simile alla modalità completamente automatica. * Il combattimento automatico è disponibile dal livello 9. * Per usare il combattimento automatico servono 3 stelle in una fase specifica.

en: * Chests are full of powerful Gear. * Every one in ten Eternal Chests Openings has a guaranteed Legendary(5*) Gear prize. * Chests are available for free: - Silver - every 10 minutes, 3 times a day - Golden - every 24 hours - Eternal - every 72 hours * Chests can be opened with a specific Chest Key. * Opening Chests with a Chest Key doesn't require any gems.
it: * I forzieri sono pieni di armamenti potenti * Un'apertura di forziere antico su 10 garantisce un equipaggiamento leggendario(5*) in premio * I forzieri sono disponibili gratis: - d'argento - ogni 10 minuti, 3 volte al giorno - d'oro - ogni 24 ore - Antichi - ogni 72 ore * I forzieri si aprono con speciali chiavi del forziere. * Aprire un forziere con una chiave del forziere non richiede gemme.

en:
* Items in this shop can be purchased with gems only. 

* Item purchased remains available in the shop with no amount limit. 

* Premium shop inventory may change periodically.
it:
* Gli oggetti di questo negozio possono venire acquistati soltanto con gemme. 

* Gli oggetti acquistati restano disponibili nel negozio senza limite di quantità. 

* L'inventario del negozio delle gemme può cambiare periodicamente.

en: * Shopping allows you to get craft materials, items and item parts. * The shop reloads every 3 hours. * Reloading partially or completely changes the shop inventory and restocks it back to full. * You reload the shop inventory by paying Gems . * Item prices and shop inventory may change during events.
it: * Facendo acquisti al negozio, puoi ottenere materiali per la creazione, oggetti e parti di oggetti. * Il negozio si ricarica ogni 3 ore. * Ricaricandolo parzialmente o completamente, il suo inventario cambia e si rifornisce completamente. * Puoi ricaricare l'inventario del negozio pagando delle gemme . * Il numero di ricariche è limitato e dipende dal tuo livello VIP. * I prezzi degli oggetti e l'inventario del negozio possono cambiare durante gli eventi.

en: * Spin to get rewards. * The first daily spin is free. * After the free spin, you can activate Tavern Spin with Spin Tokens and Gems.
it: * Gira per ottenere ricompense * I primi due giri della giornata sono sempre gratis. * Dopodiché, puoi ottenere altri giri con gettoni giro e gemme. * Il numero di giri giornalieri pagati è limitato e dipende dal tuo livello VIP.
